Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is attractive for its high-energy efficiency and expanded fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: It is also more environmentally benign than conventional power generation systems.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: Recently, increasing attention has been paid to intermediate-to-low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, which operating at 400-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: Reducing its operating temperature can render SOFC more competitive with other types of fuel cells and portable energy storage system (EES) over a range of applications (eg: transportation, portable, stationary) and more conducive for commercialization.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: The high-performance composite anode requirements for low operating temperature (400-600 degrees C) demand microstructural and chemical stability, high electronic conductivity, and good electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: The current high-temperature anode, Ni-YSZ (nickel-yttria stabilized zirconia) is generally reported with high interfacial resistance at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: This review highlights several potential composite anode materials (Ni-based and Ni-free) that have been developed for low-temperature SOFCs within the past 10 years.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: This literature survey shows that most of these anodes still exhibit relatively high polarization resistance.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: Focus is also given on reducing polarization resistance to maintain the cell power density.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels

Sentencas: In literature, common approaches that have been adopted to enhance the performance of anodes are (i) selecting high-performance electrolyte, (ii) exploiting nanopowder properties, and (iii) adding noble metals as electrocatalysts.
Titulo: Review: Enhancement of composite anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuels
